title: Fishing Planet: Green Fortune Pack
description: We have prepared an incredible Green Fortune Pack especially for all St. Patrick's Day fans! This pack includes some great spinning and casting tackle and even the Gold Horseshoe Stringer, which you will need in order to catch the cunning Snakeheads!
longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Green Fortune Pack
<!--text-->
We have prepared an incredible Green Fortune Pack especially for all St. Patrick's Day fans! This pack includes some great spinning and casting tackle and even the Gold Horseshoe Stringer, which you will need in order to catch the cunning Snakeheads! The Green Fortune Pack is nothing less than a treasure pot, with emerald- and gold-colored spinners, bass jigs, and poppers ready to attract fish from the water depths! And the cherry on top of this clover-green cake is a trendy Irish cap and an exclusive new flashlight! Rest assured that you will feel the true power of Irish luck when you find 7 POND PASSES in the pack: Everglades, Quanchkin, Sander Baggersee, Akhtuba, Weeping Willow, Blue Crab Island, and Marron!

Green Fortune Pack includes:
* 20000 CREDITS
* 13 BAITCOINS
* 7-DAYS PREMIUM
* 30 Slots
* 2 Tackle Setup Slots

RODS ‘N REELS
Rods:
* RIVERTEX™ LuckySpin 8' 10" (270) - Length: 8' 10" (2.7 m) ; Lure Weight: 7/8 – 2 1/2 Oz. (25–70 g); Power: Heavy; Line Weight: 7–28.5 Lb (4–13 kg); Action: Moderate
* RIVERTEX™ IrishHarper 8' 6" (260) - Length: 8' 6" (2.6 m); Lure Weight: 1/2 – 2 Oz (14–60 g); Power: X Heavy; Line Weight: 7–28.6 Lb  (3–13 kg); Action: Moderate
Reels:
* MagFin™ LuckyReel 6500 - Ratio: 4.5; Recovery: 27.5" (70 cm); Capacity: Mono 32/130 (0.5/130), Braid 30/215 (0.28/215); Max Drag: 28.6 Lb (13 kg); Drag: Rear
* RIVERTEX™ GoldenHarp 5000 - Ratio: 6.3; Recovery: 31.5" (80 cm); Capacity: Mono 32/100 (0.5/100), Braid 30/170 (0.28/170); Max Drag: 27.5 Lb (12.5 kg); Brake: Centrifugal

TERMINAL TACKLE
* Lines - Length 1000 yd (1000 m): 
* Fluoro .02" (0.5 mm) - Test: 28 Lb (12.7 kg)
* Braid  .007" (0.19 mm) - Test: 26.6 Lb (12.1 kg) 
* Emerald JigHead  6/7 Oz (25 g), #4/0 (x7)
* Clover Spoon 1/2 Oz (14 g), #2/0 (x13)
* Irish Bass Jig 1/2 Oz (14 g), #4/0 (x13)
* Spinnerbait Golden Tune 1 Oz (28 g), #4/0 (x13)
* Popper-Pint 1 Oz (28 g), #3/0 (x3)
* Stout Walker 1 Oz (28 g), #3/0 (x3)
* Frog-popper Rainbow Jump 5/8 Oz (18 g), #3/0 (x3)
* Swimbait Lucky Pot 1 2/3 Oz (48 g), #3/0 (x3)
* Leprechaun Buzzbait 1 Oz (28 g), #4/0 (x13)
* Irish Crayfish 4" (10 cm) (x13)

EQUIPMENT
* Patrick's Rod Case  - Rods: 3; Reels: 3; Lines: 3
* RIVERTEX™ Shamrock Headlamp  - Lighting Range: 50 yd (50 m); Lighting Spot Angle: 1.5 yd (1.5 m); Lighting Tone: Green
* Shamrock Trucker  - Tackles: 3
* Golden Horseshoe Stringer  - Max Single Fish Weight: 28.6 Lb (13 kg); Total Fish Weight: 463 Lb (210 kg)

EVENT ITEMS:
* 777 Сlover Coins

POND PASSES (7 days):
Everglades Pass
Quanchkin Pass
Sander Baggersee Lake Pass
Akhtuba River Pass
Weeping Willow Fisheries Pass
Blue Crab Island Pass
Marron River Pass

FISHING LICENSES (7 days):
Advanced Florida License
Advanced Louisiana License
Advanced Germany License
Advanced Russia License
Advanced United Kingdom License
Advanced Mississippi License
Advanced Bolivia License
